segments.text: Oh man, I can't believe what's happening in this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's right there, but she has no idea about the overflow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water from the sink is pouring out like a waterfall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's making a huge puddle, and her foot's in it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's just focused on drying that one plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes are stacked up, waiting their turn.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then there's the boy on the stool by the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's tilting; he's way too high up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Grabbing cookies from the jar like it's no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is all eager, reaching for hers.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're so sneaky, not making a sound.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains are tied back on the window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: You can see the peaceful yard and fence beyond.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is infuriatingâ€”someone needs to stop them.
segments.speaker: PAR
